name: auburn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of hair) reddish-brown in colour: auburn-haired She has a freckled complexion and auburn hair.
More examplesFewer examplesHe bows his auburn head in thought.Her blonde hair, tinted with auburn highlights, was pulled back tightly from her face.She throws her head back, and the mass of auburn curls just goes cascading down.

a reddish-brown colour of hair: Her hair is a gorgeous shade of auburn. My new hair colour is called dark auburn.
Graham Montanari/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHer hair was a spilling mass of deep auburn.If you have cool skin, avoid reddish colors like auburn, gold, copper and strawberry blond.Today her hair, the palest auburn, curled softly on her collar.
